definition[0]: in a way that relates to human society and its organization, or the quality of people’s lives
example[1]: She wanted to do a socially useful job.
definition[1]: in a way that relates to your position in society, according to your job, the amount of money you have etc
definition[2]: in situations that involve meeting people, forming relationships with them, and spending time with them
example[3]: She found him shy and socially awkward.
definition[3]: in a way that relates to society’s rules about polite behaviour
example[4]: Being drunk in public is seen as socially unacceptable in many countries.
